short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly multiselect multiple checkboxes; hover over checkboxes + Alt key to check, or Shift key to uncheck.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taking too much effort to check and uncheck multiple checkboxes in a long list? Multiselect will help you get the job done quicker. Hold down Alt key and hover mouse cursor over the checkboxes to check them. To uncheck, press the Shift key and hover over those checkboxes.
